message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional in its quality and functionality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this exclusive item to you for $180, reflecting its true value and the benefits it brings. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.

Alice, I appreciate the offer and see the value in your product. However, $180 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $150 for it, which is the maximum I'm comfortable spending. If you're open to that, I'd be happy to move forward.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I would like to make a counterproposal to accommodate your offer while still ensuring fair compensation for our product. In light of your willingness to pay up to $150, I am proposing a final price of $165 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on the item while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I hope you find this offer acceptable.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still a bit higher than my limit. As I mentioned before, I'm comfortable paying up to $150.  If you're open to that, we can close the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your patience throughout this negotiation process. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept your offer of $150 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our interests and allows us to move forward with the transaction. Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to completing the sale with you shortly.
